name: Frase
author: Frase

sections.description:
Embed the Frase Optimize experience inside your WordPress Gutenberg or Classic editor sidebar.
No more copy-pasting between WordPress and Frase!
You can now leverage Frase’s SERP Analysis, Topic recommendations, and real-time Topic Scoring inside WordPress.
sections.installation:
Click the Install Now button. Be sure to Activate it afterwards.

How to use the Frase plugin

  1. Open a Frase document, click “Share” and copy the link.
  2. In a WordPress post or page, open the Frase plugin in your right sidebar and paste the Frase document link inside.
  3. Ready to go!
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

Release date: Aug 27th, 2024

  • Re-release

1.0.8

Release date: Aug 23rd, 2022

  • Bug fixes to Topic Score to minimize discrepancies with Frase Editor
  • Color-code and indentation for headings in Search Results view
  • Expand headings to display content inside

0.1.0

Release date: May 9th, 2022

Published beta version.
